title: Rumpole's Last Case
description: Rumpole is on the job again, with his taste for claret, his penchant for poetry, and his reputation of a good story. This time, several interesting cases of murder and suspicious doings pass through chambers.“Rumpole and the Blind Tasting”;“Rumpole and the Old, Old Story”;“Rumpole and the Official Secret”;“Rumpole and the Judge’s Elbow”;“Rumpole and the Bright Seraphim”;“Rumpole and the Winter Break”;“Rumpole’s Last Case”
author: John Mortimer
